title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
description: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, there is an issue with the 'Close All Saved' functionality. It does not always work as expected.
OB:
To observe the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new file named 'f1.txt'.
2. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
3. Notice that nothing happens.
EB: Expected behavior: When selecting 'Close All Saved', all open files that have been saved should be closed.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the application with build 20020508.
2. Create a new file named 'f1.txt'.
3. Go to the file menu and select 'Close All Saved'.
4. Verify that all open files that have been saved are closed properly.
